node.excerpt: In our day to day conversations with various members of the community, we find we're constantly discussing the future direction of SAP…
It's been one hell of a year and we wanted to have one last chance to get together and geek out to discuss all things development. Huge…
In this session we have talks lined up from Mike Doyle and Jason Lante. Session Overview Session 1: What ABAP & UI5 devs need to know about…
